text: Kilpisjärvi is a village in Enontekiö municipality in Lapland, Finland. ==History== About 10 km west of Kilpisjärvi is Treriksröset. This is the point where the borders of Finland, Norway and Sweden meet. A monument was built at the exact point in 1926. It replaced an earlier marker built of stone in 1897. ==Other websites== * Kilpisjärvi Village's website Category:Municipalities of Finland Category:Lapland (Finland)
title: Kilpisjärvi
